title: Ticket #4999: Have non-zero defaults for MAXPRE and MAXPOST
description: I think it would be a good idea to have non-zero defaults for MAXPRE and MAXPOST, so that users don't have as much chance of accidentally borking their submit machine by running a ton of scripts at the same time. I guess the question is what value to go with -- something like 1000 would be more conservative, but I wonder if 100 or so would be better...
remarks:
2015-May-01 12:56:42 by wenger:
Just talked with Zach about this, and we agreed on 20, on the grounds that something much higher probably won't do any good, and you can change the default easily enough if you need to...
